QuestData.Title: Combustible Contagion
QuestData.Description:
It is true that we may have a lead on Sylvanas. Though I want nothing more than to get my hands on the Banshee Queen, the situation here at Greywatch requires immediate attention.
Yesterday, a regiment of guards returned with word of Forsaken forces in the woods. Several of them bore signs of a blight, similar to the one we endured in Gilneas. It would appear these Forsaken seek to unleash this blight upon Greywatch.
Seek out their caches and destroy them, before the blight overtakes us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn the Forsaken Blight Caches near Greywatch.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have the caches been taken care of?
QuestData.RewardText: The deed is done. $B$BYou have done a great service to the worgen of Greywatch, $n.
